tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE astronauts_health (
    astronaut_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    blood_type VARCHAR(5),
    medical_history TEXT,
    weight_kg DECIMAL(5,2),
    heart_rate INT
)

CREATE TABLE astronaut (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT,
    blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE health_record (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    heart_rate INT,
    oxygen_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_condition (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    astronaut_id INT,
    condition_name VARCHAR(50),
    treatment VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE astronauts (
  astronaut_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  health_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  astronaut_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  medication VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE space_travel (
  travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  astronaut_id INT,
  travel_date DATE,
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE vital_signs (
  sign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  astronaut_id INT,
  sign_date DATE,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(10)
)
CREATE TABLE Astronauts (         astronaut_id INT PRIMARY KEY,         name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,         age INT,         gender VARCHAR(10),         nationality VARCHAR(50)     )

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (         record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,         astronaut_id INT REFERENCES Astronauts(astronaut_id),         checkup_date DATE,         blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),         heart_rate INT     )

CREATE TABLE MedicalTests (         test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,         astronaut_id INT REFERENCES Astronauts(astronaut_id),         test_name VARCHAR(100),         result VARCHAR(20),         test_date DATE     )
CREATE TABLE Medications (         medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,         medication_name VARCHAR(100),         dosage VARCHAR(50),         astronaut_id INT REFERENCES Astronauts(astronaut_id)     )
CREATE TABLE HealthAlerts (         alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,         alert_type VARCHAR(50),         alert_date DATE,         astronaut_id INT REFERENCES Astronauts(astronaut_id)     )
